modify_description: Modified step30's ask_llm tool_response from null to {"status":"success","data":null} (Tool Return Error: success status but invalid empty data)
Modified step31's output to reflect the agent falling back to earlier deduced winner counts instead of valid LLM data
causality_chain: Tool Return Error@step30 (ask_llm returns status=success but data=null) -> ck_end_agent cannot retrieve valid winner count data -> falls back to incorrect deduced numbers -> wrong final answer
